name: Dice Clicker
description:
Dice Clicker is a game made for the 2022 GMTK Gamejam where you roll your dice to earn random amounts of cash. Upgrade your die so you can earn even more cash!

If you (for some reason) liked this game, leave a comment, I might add more stuff to the game later.

Credits:

raysan5 - raylib, scrolling cyberpunk background

astrosam - all of the textures, helping with programming

Controls:

M - Mute music

This is also the first game that I've ever published, if you have any criticism or feedback, leave it in the comments please.
